name: Oh Boy Cheese
description: Have some cheesy fun with two modes of cheesy madness. Try tojump onto scoreboard by collecting the cheese or just have some casual fun. Play one wacky mode, with trampolines, planes, presents and explosions. Whatever you choose it will be cheesetastic.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel Core Duo CPU Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: Mobile Intel Express Chipset Family Storage: 21 MB available space
